# [FEAT] Branding and Theming

## Labels
`customization`, `priority:medium`

## Description
Implement branding and theming options for white-labeling the help desk experience.

## Requirements

### Visual Branding
- Logo upload
- Favicon
- Brand colors
- Custom fonts
- Background images

### Theme Customization
- Light/dark mode
- Color scheme editor
- Component styling
- Mobile styling
- Print styles

### Help Center Theming
- Help center templates
- Custom CSS
- JavaScript customization
- Page layouts
- Navigation customization

### Agent Interface
- Agent workspace themes
- Dashboard customization
- Widget styling
- Icon sets

### Email Branding
- Email templates
- Email headers/footers
- Email logo
- Email colors
- Social links

### Multi-brand Support
- Multiple brands
- Brand-specific themes
- Brand switching
- Brand detection
- Brand-specific URLs

## Zendesk Reference
Zendesk provides customizable branding including themes, logos, and colors for help centers.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Logo and colors customizable
- [ ] Help center themed
- [ ] Email branding works
- [ ] Multi-brand support
- [ ] Theme preview available
